title: Pasta bolognese and ricotta tortellini with a courgette and garlic sauce
description: If you’re going to the trouble of making your own pasta you might as well go the whole hog and serve it with a choice of delicious sauces.For this recipe you will need a pasta machine with a tagliatelle cutter.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1-2 large courgettes, grated or sliced into ribbons using a vegetable peeler
